root.name: Create Your Own Caricature with Spitting Image
root.description: Create Your Own Caricature with Spitting Image was a title inspired by and featuring Spitting Image, the British satirical puppet show which was popular back in the 80s and 90s. It offered a unique function for the CD-i letting you make caricatures of celebrities already featured in the product - or add your own photos to manipulate via CD media.
